name: Blade Of Arena Demo
description:
Beside the different of weapons, Player begins with level 1 of every match, level up through defeating monsters and other players. You can earn skill point when you level up, similar to normal RPG, to strengthen your attack, defense, stamina or speed according to your preference to customize your fighting style.


As the game progress Players will have a higher chance of meeting other players. At this point, you must defeat other players and survive.

If you are the top player in this match. You gain the Dragon Power. Prove your POWER.

If you are one of top 5 players in this match. You still have a chance to win by defeating the dragon.

SUPPORT US ON KICKSTARTER
